wikipedia_page.main: Sir George Trevor Holdsworth  (29 May 1927 – 28 September 2010) was the former chairman of National Power and of the Bradford-based Allied Colloids international chemical business. From 1992 until 1997 he was chancellor of the University of Bradford.

response: * Sir George Trevor Holdsworth, Trustee, The Duke of Edinburgh's Award.
* Sir Trevor Holdsworth CVO, Chairman of GKN 1980–88 and of National Power 1990–95, and Chancellor 1992–97 of the University of Bradford
* Sir Trevor Holdsworth CVO, Chairman from 1980–88 of GKN, Chancellor from 1992–97 of the University of Bradford
* George Trevor Holdsworth, Chairman, Guest, Keen and Nettlefolds Ltd.
